poggle-the-lesser-commander-legacy-beta.author: Armada Legacy Beta
poggle-the-lesser-commander-legacy-beta.name: Poggle the Lesser
poggle-the-lesser-commander-legacy-beta.ability: During the Spend Defense Tokens step, friendly non-flotilla ships may choose 1 non-:scatter: defense token on another friendly ship at distance 1-3. If they do, and that token is not one of the defender's printed defense tokens, the defender may spend any defense token to instead resolve the effect of the chosen defense token.
